visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart is set to a specific height and background color, with custom margins for better spacing. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with a custom color. The legend is enabled with specific styling for better readability. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
